merchant_order_id.description: Jet's unique ID for a given merchant order

reference_order_id.description: Jet's human readable order ID number that may have a small chance of collision overtime

fulfillment_node.description: The fulfillment node that the order should be shipped from

alt_order_id.description:
Optional merchant supplied order ID. 
            #Logic

            If an alt_order_id has been associated with the merchant_order_id via the order accept message this will be passed as well.

status.description:
Current status of the order

            #Valid Values
            * created - order was created by Jet.com but not released for fulfillment
            * ready - order ready to be acknowledgedby merchant
            * acknowledged - order was acknowledged by merchant
            * inprogress - one part of the order has been shipped or cancelled
            * complete - all parts of the order have shipped or cancelled

enum: rejected - ship from location not available
acknowledgement_status.description:
Status to let jet know whether you accept or reject the order, errors that occur at the item level should be given the status 'rejected - item level error'.  This is returned in the order acknowledgement message.

            #Valid Values

            *'accepted' - all items in the order will be shipped' 

            *'rejected - unfulfillable address' - the address requested cannot be shipped to

            *'rejected - shipping method not supported' - the address requested cannot be shipped to

            *'rejected - ship from location not available' - the ship to location is invalid

            *'rejected - item level error' - the error occurred at the item level

enum: exception - jet manual canceled to complete state
exception_state.description:
signifies that something unexpected has occurred for this order.  For example, too many units shipped by merchant, merchant failed to accept order.

            #Valid Values

            *'resolved' 

            *'exception - order rejected' 

            *'exception - too many units shipped'
            
            *'exception - jet manual canceled to complete state'

            *'exception - too many units cancelled'

order_placed_date.description:
The date the merchant order was placed

            #Valid Values

            The UTC time as follows 'yyyy'-'MM'-'dd'T'HH':'mm':'ss'.'fffffff''Z' for example 5PM eastern daylight time on Jan 1st 2015 would be '2015-01-01T21:00:00.0000000Z'

order_ready_date.description:
The date the order was switched to 'ready' state

            #Valid Values

            The UTC time as follows 'yyyy'-'MM'-'dd'T'HH':'mm':'ss'.'fffffff''Z' for example 5PM eastern daylight time on Jan 1st 2015 would be '2015-01-01T21:00:00.0000000Z'

order_acknowledge_date.description:
The date the order was acknowledged by the partner

            #Valid Values

            The UTC time as follows 'yyyy'-'MM'-'dd'T'HH':'mm':'ss'.'fffffff''Z' for example 5PM eastern daylight time on Jan 1st 2015 would be '2015-01-01T21:00:00.0000000Z'

order_transmission_date.description:
The date/time the merchant order was sent to the merchant

            #Valid Values

            The UTC time as follows 'yyyy'-'MM'-'dd'T'HH':'mm':'ss'.'fffffff''Z' for example 5PM eastern daylight time on Jan 1st 2015 would be '2015-01-01T21:00:00.0000000Z'

jet_request_directed_cancel.description: This field indicates that one or more items in the order have been requested to be cancelled by Jet.com.   Please see the request_order_cancel_qty to determine which item and how much of the item should be cancelled.

price_adjustment.title: price_adjustment
price_adjustment.description: Price adjustment occured as a result of the partial cancel

principal.description: Amount to be refunded/auth that will not be captured.

tax.description: Amount to be refunded/auth that will not be captured for the given item in USD associated with tax that was charged for the item.

shipping_cost.description: Amount to be refunded/auth that will not be captured for the given item in USD associated with the shipping cost that was allocated to this item.

shipping_tax.description: Amount to be refunded/auth that will not be captured for the given item in USD associated with the tax that was charged on shipping.

regulatory_fees.description: the regulatory fees charge to the customer

order_item_id.description: Jet's unique identifier for an item in a merchant order

alt_order_item_id.description:
Optional merchant supplied ID for an item in an order.

                    #Logic

                    If an alt_order_item_id has been associated with the order_item_id via the order accept message this will be passed as well.

order_item_acknowledgement_status.description:
Value to send jet the status of each item in the order request. This is returned to Jet.com in the order acknowledgement. 

                    #Valid Values

                    *'fulfillable' - The item in the order can be shipped' 

                    *'nonfulfillable - no inventory' - No inventory for this product is available

                    *'nonfulfillable - invalid merchant SKU' - This SKU is not recognized as a valid value

merchant_sku.description: The merchant SKU that is in the given merchant order

request_order_quantity.description: The quantity of the given merchant SKU that is in the given merchant order

request_order_cancel_qty.description: The quanitity of the given merchant SKU that should be cancelled; present only if directCancelled event occured for the order

item_tax_code.description:
the tax code associated with the given merchant SKU

                    #Valid Values

                    The tax codes that you provided for the given merchant SKU

price_adjustment.title: price_adjustment
price_adjustment.description: Price adjustment occured as a result of the partial cancel

principal.description: Amount to be refunded/auth that will not be captured for the given item in USD associated with the item itself. This should be the total cost for this item not the unit cost.

tax.description: Amount to be refunded/auth that will not be captured for the given item in USD associated with tax that was charged for the item

shipping_cost.description: Amount to be refunded/auth that will not be captured for the given item in USD associated with the shipping cost that was allocated to this item

shipping_tax.description: Amount to be refunded/auth that will not be captured for the given item in USD associated with the tax that was charged on shipping

item_fees.description: The fees paid to Jet.com for the given quantity of the given merchant SKU in the given merchant order

regulatory_fees.description: The regulatory fees charge to the customer for the item purchased.

product_title.description:
Short product description

                    #Valid Values

                    1 to 500 alphanumeric characters

shipment_id.description: Jet's unique ID for a given shipment. This is defined by Jet.

alt_shipment_id.description:
Optional merchant supplied shipment ID.

                    #Logic

                    Jet will provide this field if it has been established via accept message

request_shipping_carrier.description:
The shipping carrier that is delivering the shipment 

                    #Valid Values

                    *'UPS'

                    *'FedEx'

                    *'USPS'

                    *'OnTrac'

                    *'DHL'

                    *'Freight'

request_shipment_method.description:
the shipping method for the given shipment_id; replaced by actual shipment method used in case of 'Shipped' message

                    #Logic

                    Only use shipping methods you have set up

                    #Valid Values

                    List of shipping methods the merchant has set up

request_shipment_tracking_number.description: Packaging tracking number mentioned in 'Shipped' message

request_service_level.description:
service level the customer will receive

                    #Valid Values

                   *'Standard'

                   *'Expedited'

                   *'Scheduled'

                   *'NextDay'

                   *'SecondDay'

request_ship_by.description:
Expected date that the shipment will be tendered to the given carrier

                    #Logic

                    This will be calculated based on when the merchant order is sent to the merchant and the merchant's settings for fulfilment time, and order cutoff data set at either the account level or shipping method level

                    #Valid Values

                    The UTC time as follows 'yyyy'-'MM'-'dd'T'HH':'mm':'ss'.'fffffff''Z' for example 5PM eastern daylight time on Jan 1st 2015 would be '2015-01-01T21:00:00.0000000Z'

request_delivery_by.description:
Date the customer has been promised delivery 

                    #Logic 

                    The ShippingMethod selected should provide delivery by this date as long as you meet shipping requirements you communicated during shipping set up.   If you use Jet provided labels and ship on time, you should meet this date.  If you use your own shipping labels, you can choose to use a carrier other than the one suggested by ShippingMethod as long as the DeliveryByDate is met or exceeded.

                    #Valid Values

                    The UTC time as follows 'yyyy'-'MM'-'dd'T'HH':'mm':'ss'.'fffffff''Z' for example 5PM eastern daylight time on Jan 1st 2015 would be '2015-01-01T21:00:00.0000000Z'

request_shipping_box.description:
Suggested box to use from the merchant's box catalog that is the best fit for the items in the given shipment

                    #Logic

                    This will be sent if the merchant has registered for Jet Shipping Box guidance and set up their shipping box catalog.  We will then pass them the suggested box in their catalog that best fits the items in their shipment based on our boxing algorithm.

                    #Valid Values

                    The 'Box Name' of the selected box from the box catalog you have created

shipment_tracking_number.description: packaging tracking number that the carrier is using (this is provide by merchant in shipment confirmation)

response_shipment_date.description:
Date/Time that a given shipment was shipped (this is provide by merchant in shipment confirmation)

                    #Valid Values

                    This date should be in ISO 8601 format: yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss.fffffff-HH:MM

                    Example: 2009-06-15T13:45:30.0000000-07:00

shipment_message_date.description:
When Jet received the ship complete message from the Partner

                    #Valid Values

                    The UTC time as follows 'yyyy'-'MM'-'dd'T'HH':'mm':'ss'.'fffffff''Z' for example 5PM eastern daylight time on Jan 1st 2015 would be '2015-01-01T21:00:00.0000000Z'

response_shipment_method.description:
Shipping method used for the given shipment. (This is provided by merchant in shipment confirmation)

                    #Valid Values

                    List of ShippingMethods set up by you

expected_delivery_date.description:
Date/Time that the shipment is expected to be delivered to the customer. (This is provided by merchant in shipment confirmation)

                    #Valid Values

                    This date should be in ISO 8601 format: yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss.fffffff-HH:MM

                    Example: 2009-06-15T13:45:30.0000000-07:00

ship_from_zip_code.description: The zip code of the locations from which the customer shipment is being shipped from. (This is provided by merchant in shipment confirmation)

carrier_pick_up_date.description: Date/Time that the carrier pick up the customer shipment from the facility where the shipment originated. (This is provided by merchant in shipment confirmation)

adjustment_name.description: Name of the discount being given

adjustment_type.description:
The type of discount being given wether it is directly attributed to the item or allocated from a basket level discount

                    #Valid Values

                    *'item'

                    *'allocated basket'

tax_city.description: Name of the city in which tax was collected

tax_county.description: Name of the county that tax was collected

tax_state.descrition: Two letter abbreviation for the state in which tax was collected

tax_location.description: The district that tax is collected for

district_amount.description: The amount that corresponds to the district in the array

shipment_item_id.description: Jet's unique identifier for an item in a shipment. This is defined by Jet.

alt_shipment_item_id.description:
Optional merchant supplied ID for an item in a specific shipment.

                    #Logic

                    Jet will provide this field if it has been established by accept message

merchant_sku.description:
The merchant SKU that is in the given shipment

                    #Valid Values

                    List of merchant SKUs that have been set up by you

request_shipment_sku_quantity.description: The quantity of the given merchant SKU that is in the given shipment; once 'Shipped' message recieved, contains actual shipped quantity.

request_shipment_cancel_qty.description: Quanitity of the given item that should be cancelled according to directed cancel message

base_price.description: The price for the given quantity of the given merchant SKU in the given merchant order EXCLUDING the allocated shipping, tax, and shipping tax

item_tax.description: the tax being charged on the base_price if applicable

item_shipping_cost.description: The shipping cost that is allocated to this order_item_id if applicable

item_shipping_tax.description: The tax on shipping cost that is allocated to this order_item_id if applicable
